Warden Lake is a reservoir on Moores Run (a Cacapon River tributary) near Wardensville in northern Hardy County, West Virginia, United States. Warden Lake is located within the Warden Lake Wildlife Management Area nestled between Baker Mountain () and Big Ridge ().
Recreation
Fishing
Multiple West Virginia stage record fish were caught along the Warden Lake.
References
